publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-51 Tommy Sheridan: Fat Cat Salaries—That the Parliament expresses its disgust at the obscene average level of fat cat salaries revealed in the Independent on 20 May 2003 and calls on Her Majesty’s Government to introduce a maximum wage as well as a minimum wage in order to curb these excessive packages.
S2M-51 Fat Cat Salaries (lodged on 20 May 2003) Frances Curran*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-51 Tommy Sheridan: Fat Cat Salaries—That the Parliament expresses its disgust at the obscene average level of fat cat salaries revealed in the Independent on 20 May 2003 and calls on Her Majesty’s Government to introduce a maximum wage as well as a minimum wage in order to curb these excessive packages. Supported by: Frances Curran, Donald Gorrie
